info.title: HRMS API Documentation
info.description: HRMS Backend API documentation with OpenAPI/Swagger

get.description: Returns a list of all users with their roles and permissions

post.description: Store a newly created user in storage.

put.summary: Update user roles, permissions and password
put.description: Update a user's roles, permissions and password if provided.

post.description: Authenticates user and returns access token

message.example: Too many login attempts. Please try again in 60 seconds.

post.description: Revokes the current access token
Generates a new token for the authenticated user

get.description: Returns a list of all department positions

post.description: Creates a new department position and returns it

get.description: Returns a specific department position by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of department position to return

put.description: Updates a department position and returns it

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of department position to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of department position to delete

get.description: List all employee children

post.description: Create a new employee child record

get.description: Show a specific employee child record

put.description: Update an existing employee child record

post.summary: Upload employee data from Excel file
post.description: Upload an Excel file where each row contains data for creating an employee record. Identifications and beneficiaries can also be handled if columns are provided and parsed into arrays.

file.description: Excel file (xlsx, xls, or csv) with employee data

422.description: Validation error (no file or invalid format)

get.description: Returns a list of all employees with related data

post.description: Creates a new employee with optional identifications and beneficiaries

date_of_birth_th.description: Employee date of birth in Thai format

get.description: Returns a single employee by ID with related data

put.description: Updates an existing employee record with the provided information

date_of_birth_th.description: Employee date of birth in Thai format

get.description: Returns a list of all work locations/sites
Returns employees filtered by the provided criteria

404.description: No employees found matching the criteria

post.description: Upload a profile picture for an employee

profile_picture.description: Profile picture file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg, max 2MB)

post.description: Creates a new training record

parameters.description: ID of the training to update

post.description: Creates a new employment grant allocation for an employee

400.description: Bad request - Grant position limit reached

message.example: Cannot add more allocations. Grant position limit reached.

delete.description: Deletes an employment grant allocation by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the employment grant allocation

post.summary: Upload grant data from Excel file
post.description: Upload an Excel file with multiple sheets containing grant header and item records

file.description: Excel file to upload (xlsx, xls, csv)

get.summary: List all grants with their items
get.description: Returns a list of grants and their associated items.

200.description: List of grants with items retrieved successfully

401.description: Unauthenticated - User not logged in or token expired

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission to access grants

post.description: Store a new grant with the provided details

get.description: Returns a list of all grant items across all grants

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission to access grant items

post.description: Creates a new grant item associated with an existing grant

error.example: Duplicate item with this BG Line already exists for this grant

401.description: Unauthenticated - User not logged in or token expired

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission

put.description: Update an existing grant item by ID

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission

put.description: Updates an existing grant with the provided data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the grant to update

delete.description: Delete a grant and all its associated items

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission

delete.description: Delete a specific grant item by ID

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission

get.summary: Get grant statistics with position recruitment status
get.description: Retrieves statistics for all grants including position recruitment status

401.description: Unauthenticated - User not logged in or token expired

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission to access grant statistics

get.description: Get a list of all interviews

items.example: The candidate name field is required.
The job position field is required.

get.description: Get details of a specific interview

items.example: The candidate name field is required.
The job position field is required.
The end time must be a time after start time.
